Translate.ConfirmClose: Unsaved changes will be lost.  Are you sure you want to leave this page?
Translate.UnsavedWorkWarning: There are unsaved changes.  Be sure to save the record before closing the window!
Translate.AdminSetWCAPI: WorldCat API Key has been set by the Administrator
Translate.NoWCAPI: No WorldCat API Key has been entered
Translate.PerformPresearch: Perform pre-search on the following fields:
Translate.PreferInstitutions: Give preference to WorldCat records from the following institutions:
Translate.Swap880Option: After adding a parallel field, swap original field and 880 (if needed) so that:
Translate.PinyinOnly: Chinese: Don't search WorldCat, only convert characters to Pinyin
Translate.WadeGilesSearch: Chinese: Search for Pinyin equivalents of Wade-Giles text
Translate.WCAPIAdminSet: Set WorldCat API Key for all users (Admin only)
Translate.WCAPIAdminLock: Hide WorldCat API Key from other users (Admin only)
Translate.GotoRecordWarning: Please navigate to a bibliographic record before running the app
Translate.OneRecordWarning: Note: only one record can be updated at a time.  To update a different record, please navigate to that record in Alma and run the app again.
Translate.WCAPIInvalid: WorldCat API Key or Client Secret is not valid
Translate.OAuthError: Trouble authenticating with WorldCat.  Please try again later
Translate.SSAutoSelect: Auto-select ScriptShifter language based on field 008
